shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a remote user stops or resumes publishing the video stream.

p.codeblock: public void onUserMuteVideo(int uid, boolean muted) {}
public virtual void OnUserMuteVideo(RtcConnection connection, uint remoteUid, bool muted) {}
final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int remoteUid, bool muted)? onUserMuteVideo;

dlentry.dd:
You can also use the callback with the following parameters:
(0) and (5).
(2) and (6).

section.p: When a remote user calls to stop or resume publishing the video stream, the SDK triggers this callback to report to the local user the state of the streams published by the remote user.
section.note: This callback can be inaccurate when the number of users (in the communication profile) or hosts (in the live streaming profile) in a channel exceeds 17.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.

Whether the remote user stops publishing the video stream:
: The remote user stops publishing the video stream.
: The remote user resumes publishing the video stream.
